duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, maintain, and repair MRI/CT/Nuclear Medical Devices in designated areas.
Engage with customers and work collaboratively with the team to ensure effective support and service.
Utilize basic computer skills for data input and navigation, and possess a valid driver's license for travel.
Meet all required background and physical assessment elements to obtain and maintain vendor credentialing requirements.
Receive competitive salary and benefits, and avail car allowance, toolkits, uniforms, safety gear, laptop, cell, and training.
